entry.summary:
Author: AristoMuse

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 19,072Chapters: 8/?Kudos: 71

Summary: The days after the CODE BLACK had been sent out were bleak.The Bat family was left scrambling: for gear, for information. For a home. entry.title: My Boy Only Breaks His Favorite Toys
entry.summary:
Author: ace_asterisk

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 8,733Chapters: 1/2Kudos: 15

Summary: In a city where kindness is fleeting and warmth feels like a myth, a reclusive vigilante crosses paths with another ghost orbiting the same darkness. What begins as cautious companionship spirals into something tender, fragile, and terrifying. But when fear drives him away, and violence drags you to the edge of death, Jason Todd is forced to confront the one truth he’s always run from: some things, once lost, can’t be stitched back together. And some things are worth bleeding for.

entry.title: Late.
entry.summary:
Author: pleatednpleading

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 2,046Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 33

Summary: You’re half-asleep when you hear it—the familiar click of the window, the soft thud of boots hitting your bedroom floor. It’s late. Later than he said. But you don’t even open your eyes.“Took your damn time.”Jason’s voice is sheepish, low. “Traffic in Gotham’s a bitch after midnight.”

entry.title: Devoted Little Thing
entry.summary:
Author: teklarn

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 47,732Chapters: 15/?Kudos: 421

Summary: After the death of your boyfriend, Jason Todd, your life has never been the same. You abandon everything you've ever known: your job working for Batman as a detective, your home, your friends. That is until three years after his death, your life is saved by a mysterious vigilante calling himself the Red Hood.You assume it was a one-off; that the infamous anti-hero just happened to be in the right place at the right time. But you're finding his calling card everywhere. He's around every single corner―you can't seem to get rid of him. The mystery of his identity brings you back to Bruce in hopes of finding out who he is. But as intimidating as the Red Hood is, with his blurry morals and all, you can't help but find yourself falling for him. Maybe he's the answer to your loneliness.

entry.title: Now That Your Rose Is In Bloom
entry.summary:
Author: transgendertommy

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 33,104Chapters: 21/?Kudos: 22

Summary: You begin to train with Jason Todd and Bruce Wayne under the mantle of Nightingale, a vigilante you created. When Jason gets caught up in Dick's mess and Hank and Dawn recruit him, you go with. Before you know it you're traveling across the country with your boyfriend and becoming a Titan. It's what you always wanted. What could go wrong?A Jason Todd x reader fic that basically rewrites the entire show to include the reader and the relationship through your eyes.READ AUTHORS NOTE DONT SKIP THAT CHAPTER! entry.title: Dear Daddy Long Legs
entry.summary:
Author: AthenaGC94

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 52,552Chapters: 20/30Kudos: 545

Summary: “I’m looking for an application for a scholarship.”“You didn’t have to hack our systems to apply for a scholarship,” Tim deadpanned, “I wasn’t aware you could go to college if you’re legally dead.”His eye twitched. “I’m looking for an applicant,” he amended, “She already applied.”Tim finally looked at him. “She?”_____Inspired by the novel Daddy Long Legs by Jean Webster. Jason Todd saves you from getting mugged one night and ends up being your mysterious benefactor, funding your college experience. Featuring awkward "zero rizz" Jason Todd and several members of the Bat Family.Jason Todd x Fem!Reader - does not use y/n
